content.html: This deck of cards has a bar code printed on the edge of each card. Scanning these bar codes would reveal where every card is (or isn't - if cards are missing.) Think card magic. 1/
content.value:
This deck of cards has a bar code printed on the edge of each card. Scanning these bar codes would reveal where every card is (or isn't - if cards are missing.)

Think card magic.

1/

photo.alt: A deck of cards with digital marks printed on the edge of each card.
